author: jsign
content:
Sharing two docs to kick off conversations around the EL guest program—especially on specs and potential standardization (prob suggest reading in this order):
- [Minimal execution witness format](https://hackmd.io/@jsign/zkvm-eth-minimal-execution-witness)
- [Guest program API standardization exploration](https://hackmd.io/@jsign/zkvm-eth-guest-program-api-standarization)
Comments in the docs are very welcome—especially from folks working on specs or core EL guest program development.
